bio.content:
Hey, what's up, I'm Glen. I'm a New Media Interactive Development student at RIT. I enjoy developing websites, hanging with friends, playing sports, listening to music, and tearing up Xbox LIVE with my crew.


A brief history of me:

I lived in Corvallis, Oregon all of my life. I was homeschooled by my mom until fifth grade. I went to Crescent Valley High School, played baseball from the age of four until I injured my shoulder by getting hit from behind into the boards playing hockey. I played ice hockey from 7 until freshman year of RIT when I played for the club team. I played lacrosse for the last two years of high school for Corvallis Lacrosse. By the way, go play lacrosse, it's way better than baseball.

I've always been interested in graphics and the web, thanks to Jake Likewise and Crescent Valley's Mr. Minyard.
